ContentText: 3.SQLite provides various tools for working across platforms e.g., Windows, Linux, and Mac. You need to select an appropriate version to download.
4.For example, to work with SQLite on Windows, you download the command-line shell program.
5.The downloaded file is in the ZIP format and its size is quite small.
6.First, create a new folder e.g., C:/sqlite.
7.Second, extract the content of the file that you downloaded in the previous section to the C:/sqlite folder. You should see three programs in the C:\sqlite folder
8.In CommandLine Window, navigate to the C:/sqlite and type sqlite3 to get the version installed.
